title: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
description: A sensory playground that immerses users in a heaven-like world, emulating a real sense of magic as an escape from our own world.
author: C.S. Lewis
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lc8387H7oYc

content.caption: The User is drawn towards the wardrobe by music.
The user walks through hall, brushing past fur coats and clothing.
The user continues to walk through hall and can see an opening.
The hall opens up into a playground.
As user walks, different coloured shapes appear under their feet.
The user crawls inside cave structures.
Caves reveal dimly lit room and string lights attached to ceiling.
Caves reveal dimly lit room and string lights attached to ceiling.
